## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description              | Type      | Default     |
| ---------- | ---------- | ------------------------ | --------- | ----------- |
| `disabled` | `disabled` | the label is disabled    | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `htmlfor`  | `htmlfor`  | the label is attached to | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `value`    | `value`    | the label value          | `string`  | `undefined` |
